QuestData.Title: The Singing Pools
QuestData.Description: It is crucial that we bring all of the three remaining spirits back safely. I am too old to do this myself, and for all their strengths, both Aysa and Ji are single-minded in their ideals.$B$BYou possess all the qualities of a hero, and a balance that they do not. It is you that must do this.$B$BShu, the spirit of water is somewhere in the singing pools to the east. Find Aysa there and work with her to locate him. We are all depending on you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Aysa Cloudsinger in the Singing Pools.
QuestData.RewardText: It's good to see you again, $n.$B$BThis is the pool of the skunk, as I'm sure you noticed.$B$BOver the many ages of Shen-zin Su, animals have died in some of these magical pools. Through their deaths, their spirits were infused into the waters, and anyone touching those waters will take their form.$B$BThere are several cursed pools here, some more dangerous than others.
